item.title: The Wild Unknown Tarot Deck
item.description:
The Wild Unknown Tarot Deck

The Wild Unknown Tarot Deck. Complete 78 Card Deck, includes minor and major arcana + instructions. NOTE: This is the 1st edition deck, and is no longer in print!

item.title: the constellationist
item.description:
the constellationist

So I spent half the week reconfiguring everything possible to do with my life on the internet. I broke everything like 500-million times in the process, but thankfully, it's almost all straight now. The amount of work that goes into this nonsense is mind boggling. Which is why I'm so excited about The Grid.

item.title: Emptiness: The Most Misunderstood Word In Buddhism
item.description:
Emptiness: The Most Misunderstood Word In Buddhism

"Emptiness" is a central teaching of all Buddhism, but its true meaning is often misunderstood. If we are ever to embrace Buddhism properly into the West, we need to be clear about emptiness, since a wrong understanding of its meaning can be confusing, even harmful.

item.title: The Constellationist
item.description:
The Constellationist

Intuitive readings, items, and art. The Constellationist is about making connections between points of light, exploring the space between, and gaining knowledge about the big picture. to learn & read more, vist the blog @ http://constellationist.com

item.title: The Wild Unknown Tarot Guidebook
item.description:
The Wild Unknown Tarot Guidebook

Written and illustrated by Kim Krans, this is the perfect companion to her Wild Unknown Tarot Deck!

item.title: private reading - in person
item.description:
private reading - in person

This reading is conducted in my home studio, located in Bolivar, PA. Please contact me regarding appointment time and details.
